GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
phy: qcom-qmp: fix reset-controller leak on probe errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 2156dc390402043ba5982489c6625adcb0b0975c, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit e78f3d15e115e8e764d4b1562b4fa538f2e22f6b. For more details please see the references link.
